column5: got a new citica 200d. i chose it cause it fits my big hands better tham the 200e. did i choose wisely. fits into my budget too, but hope i did the right thing. also got a quantum energy PT 6.5ft. they feel real nice together. any experience with one or the other
I have the 201e and it is my go to reel.you cant go wrong with shimano.mine is loaded with 50# pp and is on a mh muskie compre . i love it.i'm considering buying another!!
Citica is the best value in the shimano line-up. IMO
